content:
Based on the new logs, I'll update the report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production (Position 0,0 and 2,0)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing iron plates:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) with coal fuel (11), processing iron ore (22) into iron plates (2)
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) with coal fuel (12), processing iron ore (23) into iron plates (2)
Both furnaces are actively working

### Copper Plate Production (Position 4,4 and 6,4)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing copper plates:
- Furnace 3 at (4,4) with coal fuel (17), processing copper ore (7) into copper plates (7)
- Furnace 4 at (6,4) with coal fuel (18), processing copper ore (7) into copper plates (7)
Both furnaces are actively working

### Power Generation System (Position -7.5, 18.5)
Complete power generation setup consisting of:
- Steam engine at (-7.5, 18.5), working status, containing steam (200) at 165°
- Boiler at (-7.5, 22.0), working status with coal fuel (6), containing water (199.9) and steam (147.5)
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5), working status, containing water (99)
- Connected pipe groups:
  - Steam pipes at (-7.5, 15.5)
  - Empty pipes at (-7.5, 20.5)
  - Water pipes at (-8.5, 23.5)

### Power Distribution Network
Extensive power pole network operating at 600kV, connecting multiple areas including poles at:
- (1.5, 17.5), (1.5, 16.5), (5.5, 15.5)
- (7.5, 17.5), (-9.5, 18.5), (3.5, 6.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Research and Technology Issues
- Use correct technology names: 'logistic-science-pack' instead of 'LogisticSciencePack'
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Verify technology prerequisites and required science packs before researching

### Lab Location and Access Issues
- Lab positions are not being found despite extensive searching patterns
- Current search methods (exact positions, near power poles, grid pattern) are ineffective
- Consider implementing a more systematic search pattern or verifying lab existence

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels in boiler - currently running out of fuel frequently
- Maintain consistent fuel supply to prevent power generation interruptions
- Ensure proper resource distribution between furnaces and boiler

### Recipe and Crafting Errors
- Use correct prototype names for recipes
- Verify recipe existence before attempting to craft items
- For items requiring machine crafting (like iron plates), use appropriate assembly machines or furnaces instead of trying to hand craft

### Entity Connection Issues
- When connecting entities (like boiler to steam engine), ensure connection points are not blocked
- Verify proper spacing and orientation before attempting to connect entities
- Check if required connection points are accessible before placing pipes

### Automation Science Pack Production
- Cannot hand-craft automation science packs as they require machine assembly
- Ensure proper production chain setup for sub-components like iron gear wheels
- Set up dedicated assembly machines for automated production of science packs
